thread.title: Superb NYC hotel
thread.title_full: Superb NYC hotel - Review of Roger Smith Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: david_clover
title: Superb NYC hotel
text: Just completed another business trip to the US finishing in NYC and staying again at the Roger Smith. This is a superb hotel with a boutique charm, cosy well equipped rooms, an eye for art and very friendly and helpful people. And it's in a great central location. Also love the complimentary yoghurt! Many thanks!
